location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1664/459 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bombay to The Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing letter A/226 of 1872, with enclosures, from the Acting First Assistant Resident at Bushire (Captain Charles Grant) regarding reports concerning the Turkish Expedition in Nujd [Najd].None of the enclosures referred to are any longer enclosed.
